widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (50, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 5), size = (55, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 5), size = (70, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 5), size = (360, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (430, 5), size = (450, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1000, 5), size = (25, 40), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (50, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 5), size = (55, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 5), size = (70, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 5), size = (360, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (430, 5), size = (450, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1000, 5), size = (25, 35), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("RegularBold", 30), gFont("RegularBold", 30)], "itemHeight": 55 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,5), size=(350, 50), text = 1, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(360,5), size=(250, 50), text = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)) ], "fonts": [gFont("FHD", 30)], "itemHeight": 50 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint,gFont orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 40,textsize[1] + 40) offset = 45 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 161 wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (850 > wsizex): wsizex = 1000 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 96) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15,textsize[1] + 41)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["list"].instance.setFont(gFont("RegularBold", 30)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint,gFont orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 40,textsize[1] + 40) offset = 45 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 161 wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (850 > wsizex): wsizex = 1000 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 96) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15,textsize[1] + 41)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["list"].instance.setFont(gFont("RegularBold", 30)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))
